ROOT.GetAcList: select i.line_id,l.name,t1.towerno,t2.towerno,'' as reporter,v.name,'' as icing_type,'' as sjbh,i.warn_value as icing_thickness,'' as sf,i.warn_time from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_h_icingwarn_{{0}} i join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b l on i.line_id=l.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower t1 on l.id=t1.line_id and i.st_tower_id=t1.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower t2 on l.id=t2.line_id and i.end_tower_id=t2.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v on l.voltage_type=v.code WHERE i.warn_time>={1} and i.warn_time<{2}
ROOT.GetDcList: select i.line_id,l.name,t1.towerno,t2.towerno,'' as reporter,v.name,'' as icing_type,'' as sjbh,i.warn_value as icing_thickness,'' as sf,i.warn_time from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_h_icingwarn_{{0}} i join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b l on i.line_id=l.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower t1 on l.id=t1.line_id and i.st_tower_id=t1.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower t2 on l.id=t2.line_id and i.end_tower_id=t2.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v on l.voltage_type=v.code WHERE i.warn_time>={1} and i.warn_time<{2}
ROOT.GetAllDays: select distinct substr(to_char(warn_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_h_icingwarn_{{0}} UNION select distinct substr(to_char(warn_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_h_icingwarn_{{0}}
